delhi.name: Red Fort
delhi.description: Humayun's Tomb is a magnificent Mughal mausoleum, considered a precursor to the Taj Mahal. Its stunning architecture and well-maintained gardens make it a must-visit for history and architecture enthusiasts.
delhi.address: Mathura Road, Opposite, Hazrat Nizamuddin Aulia Dargah, Nizamuddin, New Delhi, Delhi, 110013

jammu & kashmir.name: Dal Lake
jammu & kashmir.address: Betaab Valley Road, Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, 192126

jaipur.name: Amber Fort
jaipur.address: Nahar Garh Road, Krishna Nagar, Brahampuri, Jaipur, Rajasthan, 302002

banaras.name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
banaras.description: Kashi Vishwanath Temple, a sacred Hindu shrine, is dedicated to Lord Shiva. It is one of the most revered temples in India and holds immense religious significance for devotees.
banaras.address: Dashashwamedh Ghat Road, Ghats of Varanasi, Godowlia, Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, 221001

mumbai.name: Gateway of India
mumbai.address: Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose Road, Marine Drive, Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400021

goa.name: Baga Beach
goa.address: Dudhsagar Waterfalls, Sonaulim, South Goa, Goa, 403410

nainital.name: Naini Lake
nainital.description: Naini Lake, the centerpiece of Nainital, is a serene and scenic freshwater lake. It offers boating opportunities, surrounded by hills and vibrant markets, making it the heart of the town.

nainital.name: Naina Devi Temple
nainital.description: Naina Devi Temple, perched on the northern shore of Naini Lake, is a revered Hindu shrine dedicated to Goddess Naina Devi. It offers spiritual solace and panoramic views of the lake.
